original_theorem:
If $f$ is differentiable at $\mathbf{X}_0,$ then $f$
is continuous at $\mathbf{X}_0$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
```

attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The linear map L is given by L(X - X₀) = m ⋅ (X - X₀) [def_1].
• M is the Euclidean norm of the vector m [def_4].
Therefore, we conclude:
• |L(X - X₀)| ≤ M |X - X₀| [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x

attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x
  sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• The definition of differentiability states f(X) - f(X₀) = L(X - X₀) + E(X)|X - X₀| [def_2].
• The term |L(X - X₀)| is bounded by M |X - X₀| [l1].
Therefore, we conclude:
• |f(X) - f(X₀)| ≤ (M + |E(X)|) |X - X₀| [l2].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have l2 (x : E) : ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ + ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc ‖f x - f X₀‖
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m (x - X₀)‖ :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f X₀) (m (x - X₀))
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - X₀)) _

lean_results.lean_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ + ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc ‖f x - f X₀‖
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m (x - X₀)‖ :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f X₀) (m (x - X₀))
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - X₀)) _
  sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ + ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc ‖f x - f X₀‖
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m (x - X₀)‖ :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f X₀) (m (x - X₀))
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - X₀)) _
  sorry

theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]

    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]

import Mathlib

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ + ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc
    ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m (x - X₀)‖ :=
      norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f X₀) (m (x - X₀))
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
      add_le_add (le_refl _) (l1 (x - X₀))
  sorry

import Aesop

theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :

  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x

    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
      add_le_add_left (l1 (x - X₀))
  sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {𝕜 : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace 𝕜 E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace 𝕜 F]
    {f : E → F} {X₀ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt 𝕜 f X₀) :
    ContinuousAt f X₀ := by
  let m := fderiv 𝕜 f X₀
  have l1 (x : E) : ‖m x‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x‖ := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : ‖f x - f X₀‖ ≤ ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ + ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc ‖f x - f X₀‖
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m (x - X₀)‖ :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f X₀) (m (x - X₀))
    _ ≤ ‖f x - f X₀ - m (x - X₀)‖ + ‖m‖ * ‖x - X₀‖ :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - X₀)) _
  sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• For all X in a neighborhood of X₀, the inequality |f(X) - f(X₀)| ≤ (M + |E(X)|) |X - X₀| holds [l2].
• The error function satisfies lim_{X → X₀} E(X) = 0 [def_3].
Therefore, we conclude:
• f is continuous at X₀ (which is defined as lim_{X → X₀} f(X) = f(X₀)). [ts_1]
